auth.welcomeDescription: Great to see you again! Sign in to continue
auth.getStartedDescription: AI that Sells & Supports — Join ConvGo now
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.offlineMessage: You're offline. Please check your internet connection.
auth.slowConnectionMessage: Slow connection detected. Operations may take longer.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor your account overview, subscription details, and usage statistics

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Manage your account profile and security settings
accountSettings.changePasswordDescription: Enter your new password below. Your current session provides sufficient authentication.
accountSettings.emailConfirmationInstructions: Please check your email and click the confirmation link to complete the change.
accountSettings.emailNoteDescription: A confirmation email will be sent to your new email address. Your current email will remain active until you confirm the change.
accountSettings.pleaseWait: Please wait while we prepare your account information...
accountSettings.pleaseEnterNewEmail: Please enter a new email address
accountSettings.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
accountSettings.thisIsCurrentEmail: This is your current email address
accountSettings.emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already in use
accountSettings.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your new email address
accountSettings.checkEmailConfirmation: Please check your email and click the confirmation link

whatsappInstances.title: WhatsApp Instances
whatsappInstances.loadingDescription: Please wait while we fetch your data...
whatsappInstances.copyPhoneNumberInstruction: Copy your phone number from WhatsApp and paste it here directly
whatsappInstances.numberOnlyError: WhatsApp number can only contain numbers
whatsappInstances.defaultRejectionMessage: Sorry, I cannot take your call right now. Please leave a message and I will get back to you.
whatsappInstances.rejectionMessageInstruction: This message will be automatically sent when rejecting incoming calls.
whatsappInstances.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this WhatsApp instance? This action cannot be undone.
whatsappInstances.scanQRCodeInstruction: Scan this QR code with your WhatsApp mobile app to connect
whatsappInstances.connectWhatsappDescription: Connect your WhatsApp account to start automating responses with AI
whatsappInstances.createInstanceDescription: Set up your first WhatsApp connection
whatsappInstances.startAutomatingDescription: Let AI handle your customer inquiries

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your documents...
fileManagement.description: Upload, process, and manage your documents with AI-powered text analysis
fileManagement.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop, or click to browse
fileManagement.configureProcessing: Configure how your documents are processed
fileManagement.chunkSizeDescription: Controls how much text is included in each searchable part. Larger chunks provide more context.
fileManagement.chunkOverlapDescription: Controls how much text is repeated between chunks. Higher overlap preserves context.
fileManagement.shortFormContent: Short Form Content: 256–512 chunk size, 20–40 overlap
fileManagement.noFilesMatch: No files match your search for
fileManagement.uploadFirst: Upload your first document to get started.

aiConfiguration.title: AI Configuration
aiConfiguration.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your AI settings...
aiConfiguration.description: Configure your AI assistant to respond to incoming WhatsApp messages
aiConfiguration.noAutoResponse: This WhatsApp number will not automatically respond to messages
aiConfiguration.promptInstructions: Set instructions that guide how the AI responds to incoming WhatsApp messages
aiConfiguration.promptPlaceholder: Provide instructions for how the AI should respond to messages...
aiConfiguration.personalitySystemDescription: Enable intelligent personality switching based on customer inquiry types. This allows your AI to respond differently for sales, support, technical issues, etc.
aiConfiguration.intelligentSwitching: Your AI will intelligently switch between personalities based on customer inquiry types
aiConfiguration.createPersonalities: Create personalities to enable intelligent response switching
aiConfiguration.voiceMessageDescription: Set how your AI assistant handles incoming voice messages on WhatsApp
aiConfiguration.voiceLanguageDescription: Select the language spoken in the voice messages to improve transcription accuracy.
aiConfiguration.voiceResponsePlaceholder: Message to send when a voice message is received
aiConfiguration.voiceResponseDescription: This reply will be automatically sent when a customer sends a voice message and voice processing is disabled.
aiConfiguration.pleaseSelect: Please select a WhatsApp instance to configure AI settings
aiConfiguration.noInstanceDescription: To configure AI settings, you need to connect a WhatsApp number first. Go to WhatsApp Numbers section to link your WhatsApp account.
aiConfiguration.promptWizardDescription: We'll help you create a customized prompt step by step to improve your AI assistant's performance
aiConfiguration.businessTypeQuestion: What type of business do you have?
aiConfiguration.businessTypeDescription: Choose the type that best describes your business
aiConfiguration.languagesQuestion: What languages should your AI support?
aiConfiguration.languagesDescription: Choose the languages your AI will interact with customers in
aiConfiguration.arabicDialectQuestion: Which Arabic dialect do you prefer?
aiConfiguration.toneQuestion: What tone should your AI use in responses?
aiConfiguration.toneDescription: Choose the style that matches your brand personality
aiConfiguration.descriptionQuestion: Describe what you want your AI assistant to do
aiConfiguration.descriptionSubtext: Write a brief description of your AI assistant's main purpose and goals
aiConfiguration.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: I want an AI assistant that answers customer inquiries about our products and helps them through the purchasing process
aiConfiguration.specialInstructionsDescription: Add any specific rules or guidelines you want your AI to follow
aiConfiguration.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: Example: Ignore questions outside our business scope, ask for phone number before providing quotes, use customer's name in responses
aiConfiguration.willAutoRespond: This WhatsApp number will automatically respond to incoming messages using AI
aiConfiguration.willNotAutoRespond: This WhatsApp number will not automatically respond to messages
aiConfiguration.connectInstanceToEnable: Connect your WhatsApp instance to enable AI responses

aiPersonalities.title: AI Personalities
aiPersonalities.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your personality settings...
aiPersonalities.description: Create and customize AI personalities for different types of customer inquiries
aiPersonalities.noInstanceDescription: To configure AI Personalities, you need to connect a WhatsApp number first. Go to WhatsApp Numbers section to link your WhatsApp account.
aiPersonalities.manageDescription: Create and customize AI personalities for different types of customer inquiries
aiPersonalities.createFirstPersonality: Create your first personality or choose from our templates to get started
aiPersonalities.templatesDescription: Choose from pre-built personalities designed for common business scenarios
aiPersonalities.configurePersonality: Configure how your AI assistant should behave for specific types of customer inquiries
aiPersonalities.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of this personality's role
aiPersonalities.intentCategoriesDescription: Select which types of customer inquiries this personality should handle
aiPersonalities.systemPromptPlaceholder: Define how this AI personality should behave and respond...
aiPersonalities.temperatureDescription: Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative
aiPersonalities.defaultPersonalityDescription: Use as fallback when intent is unclear
aiPersonalities.wizardDescription: We'll help you create a customized prompt step by step to improve your AI personality's performance
aiPersonalities.businessTypeQuestion: What type of business do you have?
aiPersonalities.businessTypeDescription: Choose the type that best describes your business
aiPersonalities.languagesQuestion: What languages should your AI support?
aiPersonalities.languagesDescription: Choose the languages your AI will interact with customers in
aiPersonalities.arabicDialectQuestion: Which Arabic dialect do you prefer?
aiPersonalities.toneQuestion: What tone should your AI use in responses?
aiPersonalities.toneDescription: Choose the style that matches your brand personality
aiPersonalities.descriptionQuestion: Describe what you want your AI assistant to do
aiPersonalities.descriptionSubtext: Write a brief description of your AI assistant's main purpose and goals
aiPersonalities.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: I want an AI assistant that answers customer inquiries about our products and helps them through the purchasing process
aiPersonalities.specialInstructionsDescription: Add any specific rules or guidelines you want your AI to follow
aiPersonalities.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: Example: Ignore questions outside our business scope, ask for phone number before providing quotes, use customer's name in responses
aiPersonalities.billingFinanceDescription: Professional and accurate billing and payment specialist
aiPersonalities.customerSupportDescription: Empathetic and solution-focused customer service representative
aiPersonalities.friendlyGeneralDescription: Warm and helpful general-purpose assistant for all inquiries
aiPersonalities.technicalSupportDescription: Patient and knowledgeable technical troubleshooting specialist

customerProfiles.title: Customer Profiles
customerProfiles.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your customer data...
customerProfiles.description: Manage and view detailed customer information and conversation history
customerProfiles.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, phone, email, or company...
customerProfiles.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters
customerProfiles.profilesWillAppear: Customer profiles will appear here as customers interact with your WhatsApp AI
customerProfiles.insightsDescription: Insights about your customer base and engagement
customerProfiles.showingFiltered: Showing {{start}} to {{end}} of {{filtered}} filtered customers ({{total}} total)
customerProfiles.noInstanceDescription: To view customer profiles, you need to connect a WhatsApp number first. Go to WhatsApp Numbers section to link your WhatsApp account.

customerProfileEdit.title: Edit Customer Profile
customerProfileEdit.profileNotFoundDescription: The requested customer profile could not be found.
customerProfileEdit.basicInformationDescription: Update the customer's basic contact and company information
customerProfileEdit.tagsDescription: Add relevant tags to categorize this customer (e.g., VIP, wholesale, etc.)
customerProfileEdit.aiInsightsDescription: AI-generated insights about the customer's behavior and preferences
customerProfileEdit.conversationSummaryDescription: Overview of conversations and interactions with this customer
customerProfileEdit.summaryPlaceholder: Enter a summary of conversations with this customer...
customerProfileEdit.summaryDescription: Provide a brief overview of the customer's interaction history and preferences
customerProfileEdit.statisticsDescription: Read-only statistics about this customer's activity
customerProfileEdit.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your data collection settings...
dataCollection.description: Automatically collect and export customer data from WhatsApp conversations to Google Sheets
dataCollection.connectGoogleAccount: Connect your Google account to export data to Google Sheets
dataCollection.noGoogleAccountConnected: No Google account connected. Connect your account to start collecting data.
dataCollection.dataCollectionActiveDescription: This WhatsApp number will automatically collect data from conversations
dataCollection.dataCollectionDisabledDescription: This WhatsApp number will not collect any data from conversations
dataCollection.pleaseSelectWhatsapp: Please select a WhatsApp number to configure data collection
dataCollection.pleaseWaitDoNotRefresh: Please wait, do not refresh the page.
dataCollection.pasteGoogleSheetUrl: Paste the full Google Sheets URL or just the Sheet ID
dataCollection.sheetTabNameDescription: The name of the specific tab in your Google Sheet (default: Sheet1)
dataCollection.customFieldsDescription: Define the fields you want to collect from WhatsApp conversations. These fields will be automatically extracted and exported to your Google Sheet.
dataCollection.noFieldsConfigured: No fields configured yet. Add your first field to start collecting data.
dataCollection.configureNewField: Configure a new field to collect data from WhatsApp conversations.
dataCollection.fieldNamePlaceholder: e.g., Customer Name, Phone Number, Email Address
dataCollection.fieldNameDescription: Enter the name of the field you want to collect from customers (supports both Arabic and English)
dataCollection.viewAndManageData: View and manage data collected from WhatsApp conversations
dataCollection.searchByPhoneOrConversation: Search by phone or conversation ID...
dataCollection.noDataCollected: No data collected yet. Data will appear here when customers interact with your WhatsApp bot.
dataCollection.dataExportedSuccessfully: Data exported to Google Sheets successfully
dataCollection.failedToExportData: Failed to export data to Google Sheets
dataCollection.successfullyExported: Successfully exported {{count}} sessions to Google Sheets
dataCollection.connectWhatsAppToUseDataCollection: To configure data collection, you need to connect a WhatsApp number first. Go to WhatsApp Numbers section to link your WhatsApp account.

escalation.title: Escalation Management
escalation.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your escalation settings...
escalation.description: Manage escalated conversations and resolve them when needed
escalation.supportTeamDescription: Add WhatsApp numbers for support team to receive notifications when conversations are escalated
escalation.enterWhatsappNumber: Enter WhatsApp Number With Country Code
escalation.addSupportNumbersPrompt: Add support team numbers to receive escalation notifications
escalation.escalationSettingsDescription: Customize escalation messages and criteria for each WhatsApp account
escalation.enableEscalationDescription: Enable or disable automatic escalation to human support
escalation.smartAiDetectionDescription: Automatically detect when customers need human support using AI intent analysis
escalation.keywordDetectionDescription: Trigger escalation based on specific keywords in customer messages
escalation.escalationKeywordsDescription: Keywords that trigger immediate escalation to human support. Press Enter to add each keyword as a tag.
escalation.typeKeywordPlaceholder: Type a keyword and press Enter to add
escalation.escalationMessagePlaceholder: Message sent to customer when conversation is escalated
escalation.escalationMessageDescription: This message is sent to the customer when their conversation is escalated to human support
escalation.escalatedConversationMessagePlaceholder: Message sent to customer when they try to communicate during escalation
escalation.escalatedConversationMessageDescription: This message is sent to customer when they try to send messages while conversation is escalated
escalation.escalatedConversationsDescription: Manage and track conversations that have been escalated to human support
escalation.phoneValidationTooShort: Phone number must be at least 11 digits
escalation.selectInstanceFirst: Please Select a WhatsApp Number First
escalation.selectInstanceDescription: Select a WhatsApp number from the dropdown above to manage support team numbers and escalation settings
escalation.connectWhatsAppToUseEscalation: To configure escalation management, you need to connect a WhatsApp number first. Go to WhatsApp Numbers section to link your WhatsApp account.

externalActions.title: External Actions
externalActions.loadingDescription: Please wait while we prepare your settings...
externalActions.description: Create custom actions that trigger webhooks based on customer messages
externalActions.needInstanceMessage: You need to connect a WhatsApp instance before creating external actions.
externalActions.createFirstActionMessage: Create your first external action to start automating workflows with webhooks.
externalActions.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone. All execution logs will also be deleted.
externalActions.pleaseSelectInstance: Please select a WhatsApp instance first
externalActions.missingInstanceMessage: No WhatsApp instance specified. Please return to External Actions and try again.
externalActions.createActionDescription: Create a new custom action that triggers webhooks based on customer messages

basicInfo.title: Basic Info
basicInfo.description: Set up the basic information for your external action
basicInfo.displayNameHelper: Human-readable name shown in the interface
basicInfo.actionNameHelper: Internal identifier (lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only)
basicInfo.actionNameInvalid: Action name must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores

training.title: Training Examples
training.description: Provide examples of messages that should trigger this action
training.atLeastThree: At least 3 training examples are required

webhook.title: Webhook Configuration
webhook.description: Configure the webhook URL and request settings
webhook.headersHelper: Optional custom headers for authentication or content type

payload.title: Payload & Variables
payload.description: Define data extraction variables and webhook payload structure
payload.variablePromptPlaceholder: Extract the product name from the message

settings.title: Settings
settings.confidenceHelper: Minimum confidence required to trigger this action

response.title: Response Configuration
response.description: Configure how ConvGo responds after executing this action
response.noneDescription: Action executes silently without sending any message
response.simpleConfirmationDescription: Send a basic confirmation message immediately
response.customMessageDescription: Send a personalized message using extracted data
response.waitForWebhookDescription: Wait for the automation platform to send a dynamic response
response.confirmationPlaceholder:
✅ Data received and sent successfully!
Thank you.
response.customPlaceholder: Hello {name}, your order {order_id} has been received successfully!
response.variablesInfo: Use {variable_name} in your message to insert dynamic values
response.fallbackMessage: This message will only be sent if the automation platform fails to respond within the timeout period.
response.timeoutHelper: How long to wait for a response before timing out

tester.title: Test Action
tester.description: Test how your action is detected and executed
tester.testMessagePlaceholder: Enter a message to test the action...

logs.title: Execution Logs
logs.description: View and analyze action execution logs
logs.noLogsMessage: This action hasn't been executed yet. Logs will appear here when the action runs.
